a11y_change_order_date_trigger: Change order date, current order date is

cancel_reasons.2: I have too many of this product
cancel_reasons.12: This product is out of stock
cancel_reasons.7: I did not receive my order as expected
cancel_reasons.13: I did not intend to join a subscription program

upgrade_subscription_to_prepaid_cta: Save up to {{ prepaid_incentives.derived.maxRecurringDiscount }}% by upgrading to a prepaid subscription!
form_billing_unavailable: Payment information not available to be displayed.
iu_advertisement_text: Save 5% on any items added to this shipment
modal_upgrade_to_prepaid_subheader: You will be charged for this upgrade on your upcoming subscription shipment date ({{ order.place | date }})
modal_upgrade_discount_code_warning: Any existing discount codes used on this subscription will no longer apply once upgraded to prepaid
modal_cancel_body: Before you go please share your reason for canceling, weâ€™re always working on improving your experience.
modal_cancel_skip_text: Are you sure? This will cancel all future shipments of {{ product.name }}. Remember you can always delay and upcoming shipment by changing the date of the next order
modal_cancel_pause_body: Overstocked? Not a problem, delay your shipment to get {{ product.name }} when you are ready!
modal_change_product_header: Please select a product you would like to instead receive.
modal_change_product_prepaid_subtext: Prepaid products can be swapped to another item of equal value
modal_delete_subscription_item_body: Are you sure you want to remove {{ product.name }} from this shipment? If so, your next shipment will be placed on {{ next_order_date }}. Other items in this shipment will still be sent as scheduled.
modal_delete_one_time_item_body: Removing this product means you will not receive it in your upcoming shipment
modal_pause_subscription_body: Select when you would like your shipments to resume.
modal_send_now_body: Do you want to send this shipment now? We will do our best to process your order in the next 24 hours and you will be notified when it ships.
modal_shipping_subtitle: Updating this address will update it for all subscriptions using it
modal_billing_subscriptions_display_head: Subscriptions associated with the payment method above
modal_billing_info_header: We will send you an email to update your payment.
modal_billing_info_text: This will replace your current payment method and update all subscriptions you currently have to the new payment method.
modal_skip_body: By skipping your upcoming order, the order will instead send on the next available date based on the frequency you selected.
modal_skip_item_body: Skipping {{ product.name }} will remove it from the upcoming order on {{ order.place | date }} and instead send on the next available date based on the frequency you selected.
modal_subscription_reactivate_body: Are you sure you want to reactivate this subscription?
not_a_subscriber: You have no active subscription items. Learn more about GNC Routines.
page_error: OOPS! Something went wrong with your SMI.
payment_is_expired: The card used for this shipment has expired
payment_is_expiring: The card used for this shipment will expire soon
payment_will_be_expired: The card used for this order will expire before your next shipment
prepaid_subscription_charge_message: Prepaid total will be charged with upcoming shipment
shop_now_button_text: Add items to your next order
total_box_disclaimer: * Tax may be applied once order is processed
change_date_warning: Please note, you will not be able to make any further changes to your Routines order once changes are applied.
signature_required_warning: Due to local weight loss supplement regulations, persons under the age of 18 are prohibited from purchasing this item. A valid ID must be presented upon delivery or pick up in-store. A {{shipping_fee}}  delivery fee is added to orders containing weight loss supplements
shipment_sent_info: Your Order is Ready to Ship.

notifications.change_shipment_date_success: Success! This shipment will be placed on {{notification.target.place | date if notification.target}}.
notifications.change_shipment_date_error: An error occurred while changing the shipment date. Please try again later.
notifications.send_now_success: Success! Your shipment has been queued and will be placed within 24 hours.
notifications.send_now_error: An error occurred while queueing your shipment. Please try again later.
notifications.cancel_subscription_success: Success! Your subscription has been canceled.
notifications.cancel_subscription_error: An error occurred while cancelling your subscription. Please try again later.
notifications.reactivate_subscription_success: Success! Your subscription has been reactivated.
notifications.reactivate_subscription_error: An error occurred while reactivating your subscription. Please try again later.
notifications.order_cancel_success: Success! This shipment has been skipped. Your next shipment will be scheduled according to your subscription preferences.
notifications.order_cancel_error: An error occurred while skipping the shipment. Please try again later.
notifications.change_product_success: Success! Your subscription item has been changed.
notifications.change_product_error: Your subscription item couldn't be changed. Please try again later.
notifications.change_product_prepaid_eligible_error: Product needs to be prepaid eligible
notifications.change_product_unsent_status_error: This subscription is not in an unsent order
notifications.change_product_higher_price_error: Product price is higher than the current product price for free prepaid subscription
notifications.change_product_orders_needs_placement_er: Prepaid renewal subscription has other orders that needs to be placed before changing for a more expensive product
notifications.change_subscription_quantity_success: Success! All future shipments will contain {{ notification | get('target.quantity')}} of this item.
notifications.change_subscription_quantity_error: An error occurred while updating the shipment quantity of this item. Please try again later.
notifications.change_one_time_quantity_success: You will receive {{ notification | get('target.quantity')}} of this item.
notifications.change_one_time_quantity_error: An error occurred while updating the shipment quantity of this item. Please try again later.
notifications.change_shipping_address_success: Success! Your shipping preferences have been updated.
notifications.change_shipping_address_error: An error occurred while changing your shipping address. Please try again later.
notifications.change_subscription_frequency_success: Success! This item will now ship every {{'frequency_period' | t(every=notification.target.every, period=notification.target.every_period) if notification.target}}. Your next shipment date has not changed.
notifications.change_subscription_frequency_error: An error occurred while changing the shipping period. Please try again later.
notifications.change_subscription_renewal_behavior_to_: Success! Your subscription will be renewed
Success! Your subscription will not be renewed
notifications.change_subscription_renewal_behavior_err: An error occurred while changing the behavior of your prepaid subscription. Please try again later.
notifications.delete_subscription_item_success: {{notification | get('target.product.name')}} has been removed from this shipment, but you will receive it in future shipments.
notifications.delete_subscription_item_error: {{notification | get('target.product.name')}} wasn't removed from this shipment. Please try again later.
notifications.upgrade_subscription_to_prepaid_success: Congrats! You have upgraded your {{notification | get('target.product.name')}} to a prepaid subscription.
notifications.upgrade_subscription_to_prepaid_error: An error occurred while upgrading your subscription. Please refresh and try again later.
notifications.delete_one_time_item_success: {{notification | get('target.product.name')}} has been removed from this shipment.
notifications.delete_one_time_item_error: {{notification | get('target.product.name')}} wasn't removed removed from this shipment. Please try again later.
notifications.pause_subscription_success: Success! This subscription has been paused until {{ notification.date | date if notification.date }}.
notifications.pause_subscription_error: An error occurred while pausing your subscription. Please try again later.
notifications.change_billing_send_email_success: Success! You will receive an email from us shortly to update your payment information.
notifications.change_billing_send_email_error: An error occurred while sending your payment update email. Please try again later.
